response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a long-lasting partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
